cms.query.QueryText: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM View_CMS_Tree_Joined t inner join KDA_CampaignsProduct p on t.DocumentForeignKeyValue = p.CampaignsProductID inner join COM_SKU s on s.SKUID = t.NodeSKUID inner join KDA_ProductCategory pc on pc.ProductCategoryID = p.CategoryID inner join KDA_Program pr on pr.ProgramID = p.ProgramID where p.ProgramID IS NOT NULL and t.ClassName = 'KDA.CampaignsProduct' and t.NodeSKUID IS NOT NULL and NodeParentID in (select NodeID FROM View_CMS_Tree_Joined WHERE ClassName = 'KDA.Program' and NodeParentID = @CampaignNodeId and NodeSiteID = @SiteId)
